name: Captain Rikoris
description: A trustworthy captain with his own unique spearmanship
story: Rikoris joined the Taranor Army on Schuri's advice and mastered his skills of spearmanship in a battle against the Chaos Sect. Now he spends his time trying to ease the unrest in Taranor while becoming the greatest spearman ever.

relations.description: An old friend who can be relied on despite the long distance. Rikoris plans to convince her to join the Spear Club once he's back in Reingar.
A spiteful friend who made fun of the Spear Club. Rikoris will show him the true strength of spearmanship.
If it weren't for Schuri, Rikoris wouldn't have been able to join the Taranor Army. He wants to repay this debt no matter what.
A mentor who taught Rikoris a great deal. He hopes to match his skill and personality.

specialty.name: Endless Effort
specialty.description: In order to become the best spearman, he continues to practice every day.

type.name: Gathering
type.description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.

skills.name: Quick Pierce
skills.description: Attacks with a spear, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is granted increased Speed, effect chance increases by 25%.

skills.soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

skills.name: Supreme Spear
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with spear art, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the target before a 75% chance to restrict for 2 turns. Has a 75% chance to stun the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 1 turn regardless of whether the attack hits, and recovers the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Health.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 12%.
Increases Health by 20%.
Increases Effectiveness.
Increases Effectiveness by 2%.
Increases Effectiveness by 5%.
Increases Effectiveness by 10%.
Increases Defense.
Increases Defense by 3%.
Increases Defense by 8%.
Increases Defense by 15%.
Increases Hit Chance of all allies.
Increases Hit Chance of all allies by 1%.
Increases Hit Chance of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Hit Chance of all allies by 5%.
Damage dealt increases when attacking a Dark elemental target.
Damage dealt increases by 5% when attacking a Dark elemental target.
Damage dealt increases by 12% when attacking a Dark elemental target.
Damage dealt increases by 20% when attacking a Dark elemental target.
Increases damage dealt by Supreme Spear.
Increases damage dealt by Supreme Spear by 2%.
Increases damage dealt by Supreme Spear by 5%.
Increases damage dealt by Supreme Spear by 10%.
Has a chance to dispel a debuff from the caster when the caster's Health is 20% or less at the start of the turn.
Has a 20% chance to dispel a debuff from the caster when the caster's Health is 20% or less at the start of the turn.
Has a 50% chance to dispel from debuff on the caster when the caster's Health is 20% or less at the start of the turn.
Has a 100% chance to dispel a debuff from the caster when the caster's Health is 20% or less at the start of the turn.
Healing of Supreme Spear increases.
Healing of Supreme Spear increases by 40%.
Healing of Supreme Spear increases by 100%.
Healing of Supreme Spear increases by 200%.
Has a chance to inflict additional damage when attacking a Dark elemental target with Quick Pierce. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Has a 5% chance to inflict additional damage when attacking a Dark elemental target with Quick Pierce. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Has a 15% chance to inflict additional damage when attacking a Dark elemental target with Quick Pierce. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Has a 30% chance to inflict additional damage when attacking a Dark elemental target with Quick Pierce. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Increases Attack and Defense when the caster's Health is 50% or less.
Increases Attack and Defense by 5% when the caster's Health is 50% or less.
Increases Attack and Defense by 12% when the caster's Health is 50% or less.
Increases Attack and Defense by 20% when the caster's Health is 50% or less.

debuffs.name: Restrict
debuffs.effect: The target will receive no Combat Readiness increase/decrease effects other than those provided by their Speed stat.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

localize.name: 先遣部隊長 リコリス

skill1.name: 速突
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。自身がスピードUP状態の場合、効果発生率が25%UPする。

skill2.name: 加勢
skill2.desc: 味方全体にスピードUPを2ターンの間付与する。
skill2.soul_description: 味方全体にスピードUPを2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 最強槍術
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、75.0%の確率で強化効果を1つ解除し、75%の確率で束縛を2ターンの間付与する。攻撃の命中判定と関係なく、75%の確率でアクションゲージが最も高い敵にスタンを1ターンの間付与する。自身の生命力を回復する。自身の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
